comments: Primes of the form x^2+xy+2y^2, discriminant -7. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2014Primes of the form x^2-xy+2y^2 with x and y nonnegative. - _T. D. Noe_, May 07 2005Also, primes which are squares (mod 7) (or, (mod 14): see A191017 for a sequence formerly defined as such). - _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 15 2016
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
N. J. A. Sloane et al., Binary Quadratic Forms and OEIS (Index to related sequences, programs, references)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(740)|p mod 7 in [0, 1, 2, 4]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 13 2012(PARI) select(p->issquare(Mod(p,7))&&isprime(p),[1..1000]) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 15 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
